verbs.description: As [ARG0: the White House physician 's report on President Donald Trump 's physical] [V: makes] [ARG1: clear] , the president is healthier than he looks in large part for one reason .
[ARGM-ADV: As the White House physician 's report on President Donald Trump 's physical makes clear] , [ARG1: the president] [V: is] [ARG2: healthier than he looks in large part for one reason] .
As the White House physician 's report on President Donald Trump 's physical makes clear , the president is healthier than [ARG0: he] [V: looks] in large part for one reason .
